mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL ( PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID, INCIDENT_GUID, INCIDENT_NUMBER_LABEL, NEWS_CREATED_TIMESTAMP, STAGE_OF_CONTROL_CODE, GENERAL_INCIDENT_CAUSE_CAT_ID, NEWS_PUBLICATION_STATUS_CODE, DISCOVERY_DATE, DECLARED_OUT_DATE, FIRE_CENTRE, FIRE_ZONE_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER, FIRE_OF_NOTE_IND, INCIDENT_NAME, INCIDENT_LOCATION, INCIDENT_OVERVIEW, TRADITIONAL_TERRITORY_DETAIL, INCIDENT_SIZE_TYPE, INCIDENT_SIZE_ESTIMATED_HA, INCIDENT_SIZE_MAPPED_HA, INCIDENT_SIZE_DETAIL, INCIDENT_CAUSE_DETAIL, CONTACT_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER, CONTACT_PHONE_NUMBER, CONTACT_EMAIL_ADDRESS, RESOURCE_DETAIL, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_IND, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_DETAIL, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RESOURCE_IND, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RSRC_DETAIL, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_IND, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_DTL, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_IND, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_DTL, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_IND, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_DTL, PUBLISHED_TIMESTAMP, PUBLISHED_USER_TYPE_CODE, PUBLISHED_USER_GUID, PUBLISHED_USER_USERID, PUBLISHED_USER_NAME, LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, REVISION_COUNT, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES (#{dto.publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentNumberLabel, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.newsCreatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.stageOfControlCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.generalIncidentCauseCatId, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.newsPublicationStatusCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.discoveryDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.declatedOutDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireCentre, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireZoneUnitIdentifier, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.fireOfNoteInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentLocation, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentOverview, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.traditionalTerritoryDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeType, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeEstimatedHa, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeMappedHa, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentSizeDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentCauseDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactOrgUnitIdentifer, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactPhoneNumber, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.contactEmailAddress, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.resourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserUserId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.publishedUserName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.lastUpdatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{dto.latitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.longitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.revisionCount, javaType=java.lang.Long, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, #{dto.createUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.createDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.updateUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.updateDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN})
mapper.update: UPDATE WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL SET PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID = #{dto.publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_GUID = #{dto.incidentGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_NUMBER_LABEL = #{dto.incidentNumberLabel, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, NEWS_CREATED_TIMESTAMP = #{dto.newsCreatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, STAGE_OF_CONTROL_CODE = #{dto.stageOfControlCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, GENERAL_INCIDENT_CAUSE_CAT_ID = #{dto.generalIncidentCauseCatId, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, NEWS_PUBLICATION_STATUS_CODE = #{dto.newsPublicationStatusCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, DISCOVERY_DATE = #{dto.discoveryDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, DEDLARED_OUT_DATE = #{dto.declaredOutDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, FIRE_CENTRE = #{dto.fireCentre, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, FIRE_ZONE_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER = #{dto.fireZoneUnitIdentifier, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, FIRE_OF_NOTE_IND = #{dto.fireOfNoteInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_NAME = #{dto.incidentName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_LOCATION = #{dto.incidentLocation, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_OVERVIEW = #{dto.incidentOverview, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, TRADITIONAL_TERRITORY_DETAIL = #{dto.traditionalTerritoryDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_SIZE_TYPE = #{dto.incidentSizeType, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_SIZE_ESTIMATED_HA = #{dto.incidentSizeEstimatedHa, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_SIZE_MAPPED_HA = #{dto.incidentSizeMappedHa, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_SIZE_DETAIL = #{dto.incidentSizeDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_CAUSE_DETAIL = #{dto.incidentCauseDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CONTACT_ORG_UNIT_IDENTIFIER = #{dto.contactOrgUnitIdentifer, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, CONTACT_PHONE_NUMBER = #{dto.contactPhoneNumber, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CONTACT_EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{dto.contactEmailAddress, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, RESOURCE_DETAIL = #{dto.resourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_IND = #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, WILDFIRE_CREW_RESOURCES_DETAIL = #{dto.wildfireCrewResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RESOURCE_IND = #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, WILDFIRE_AVIATION_RSRC_DETAIL = #{dto.wildfireAviationResourceDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_IND = #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, HEAVY_EQUIPMENT_RESOURCES_DTL = #{dto.heavyEquipmentResourcesDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_IND = #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, INCIDENT_MGMNT_CREW_RSRC_DTL = #{dto.incidentMgmtCrewRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_IND = #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcInd, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, STRUCTURE_PROTECTION_RSRC_DTL = #{dto.structureProtectionRsrcDetail, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, PUBLISHED_TIMESTAMP = #{dto.publishedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, PUBLISHED_USER_TYPE_CODE = #{dto.publishedUserTypeCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, PUBLISHED_USER_GUID = #{dto.publishedUserGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, PUBLISHED_USER_USERID = #{dto.publishedUserUserId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, PUBLISHED_USER_NAME = #{dto.publishedUserName, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, LATITUDE = #{dto.latitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, LONGITUDE = #{dto.longitude, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, LAST_UPDATED_TIMESTAMP = #{dto.lastUpdatedTimestamp, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, REVISION_COUNT = REVISION_COUNT + 1, CREATE_USER = #{dto.createUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CREATE_DATE = #{dto.createDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{dto.updateUser, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = #{dto.updateDate, javaType=java.util.Date, jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN} WHERE PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID = #{dto.publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL WHERE PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID = #{publishedIncidentDetailGuid, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=BINARY, mode=IN}
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL WHERE geometry && ST_MakeEnvelope (#{xmin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{xmax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, 4326)
AND stage_of_control_code = 'OUT'
AND stage_of_control_code != 'OUT'
AND (fire_of_note_ind = '1' OR fire_of_note_ind = 'T')
AND fire_centre = #{fireCentre, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
ORDER BY
incident_number_label fire_of_note_ind location incident_name fire_centre stage_of_control_code last_updated_timestamp ASC, ASC DESC, DESC
OFFSET #{offset, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageRowCount, javaType=java.lang.Integer, jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WFNEWS.PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL WHERE PUBLISHED_INCIDENT_DETAIL_GUID IS NOT NULL

SELECT json_build_object( 'type', 'FeatureCollection', 'features', json_agg(ST_AsGeoJSON(t.*)::json) ) FROM wfnews.published_incident_detail AS t WHERE stage_of_control_code = #{stageOfControlCode, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} AND fire_of_note_ind != '1' AND fire_of_note_ind != 'T' AND geometry && ST_MakeEnvelope (#{xmin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{xmax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, 4326)

SELECT json_build_object( 'type', 'FeatureCollection', 'features', json_agg(ST_AsGeoJSON(t.*)::json) ) FROM wfnews.published_incident_detail AS t WHERE stage_of_control_code != 'OUT' AND (fire_of_note_ind = '1' OR fire_of_note_ind = 'T') AND geometry && ST_MakeEnvelope (#{xmin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymin, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{xmax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, #{ymax, javaType=java.lang.Double, jdbcType=DOUBLE, mode=IN}, 4326)
